title: Our Modern Day "Full House" Isn't Working
itunes:title: Our Modern Day "Full House" Isn't Working
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’m a 48 year old female and I live in my childhood home with my 2 older sisters, older brother, my son, my son’s girlfriend and my daughter. My parents moved to Texas and left us all in the house. It’s a 6 bedroom house with 3 bathrooms so there’s plenty of space for everyone. The house is paid for and we all split the bills. We have not had any issues with our living arrangement until recently when my bitter older sister who has no life, decided that it’s time for my daughter, my son and my son’s girlfriend to move out........

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
